htmlExpert.lvlDescription:
Write a short program that will have a title for the movie 'Tarzan', a short description (that is already written, you just need to put the perfect tag for it) and an image (movie.png)
- write all the important tags in order
- in head you will have just a title
- in body you will need to put the title of the movie, tags for the description and the movie.png as image
htmlExpert.lvlTemplate:
<[cod]>
   <[cod]>
     <[cod]> Tarzan </[cod]>
   </[cod]>
   <[cod]>
     <[cod]> [cod] </[cod]>
     <[cod]> The movie is about Tarzan. <[cod]>
     <[cod] src='[cod]' alt='movie'>
   </[cod]>
</[cod]>
